Name: Add-JobTrigger
Synopsis: Adds job triggers to scheduled jobs.

Name: Disable-JobTrigger
Synopsis: Disables the job triggers of scheduled jobs.

Name: Enable-JobTrigger
Synopsis: Enables the job triggers of scheduled jobs.

Name: Get-JobTrigger
Synopsis: Gets the job triggers of scheduled jobs.

Name: Get-ScheduledJob
Synopsis: Gets scheduled jobs on the local computer.

Name: Get-ScheduledJobOption
Synopsis: Gets the job options of scheduled jobs.

Name: New-JobTrigger
Synopsis: Creates a job trigger for a scheduled job.

Name: New-ScheduledJobOption
Synopsis: Creates an object that contains advanced options for a scheduled job.

Name: Remove-JobTrigger
Synopsis: Delete job triggers from scheduled jobs.

Name: Set-JobTrigger
Synopsis: Changes the job trigger of a scheduled job.

Name: Set-ScheduledJobOption
Synopsis: Changes the job options of a scheduled job.

Name: Unregister-ScheduledJob
Synopsis: Deletes scheduled jobs on the local computer.
